title: [Vornavis, Outlands Road]
description: To the side of the trail, a cluster of tubebrush plants has displaced the steppe grass.  A half dozen plants, their circular fans of broad, ground-hugging leaves carpeting an area the size of a cottage, lift their namesake cylinders of pale blossoms aloft on stalks in the moonlight.

To the side of the trail, a cluster of tubebrush plants has displaced the steppe grass.  A half dozen plants, their circular fans of broad, ground-hugging leaves carpeting an area the size of a cottage, lift their namesake cylinders of violet blossoms aloft on stalks of jade green.
